class  DzUri
 Class that represents a Uniform Resource Indicator as used for Scene Asset I/O.Represents a URI as it is used for the new DAZ Studio file format. This class provides functionality in addition to standard URI/URL representations that is specific to the DAZ Studio file format. For general URI/URL use, it is recommended that developers use the QUrl class from the Qt framework instead. More...
